featured.text: According to the passage, what triggers the gender change in the blackspot angelfish? (A) Dangers to the group.

definition.zh_def: 危險，指可能造成傷害或損失的情況或事物。
definition.en_def: Dangers refer to situations or things that may cause harm or loss.
definition.example: The dangers of driving without a seatbelt are well known.
